title.en: Girls und Panzer - Chi-HaTan Academy Aggressive (Doujinshi)

description.en: A collection of short stories about the shenanigans going on at Chi-Ha-Tan Academy

altTitles.th: Bloody Monday รหัสมรณะ

altTitles.ja: ブラッディ・マンデイ

description.en:
A virus deal clinched in Russia on the Christmas eve. Purpose: unknown. Two clues: a mysterious lady "Maya," who is one of the gangsters, and "Bloody Monday," the keyword for the project.  
Then an incident happened in far-distant city of Tokyo. Fujimaru Takagi, a second year student at Mishiro Gakuin high school, is commissioned to find out the truth by the Public Security Intelligence Agency, for his great ability as a super hacker. Now, Maya approaches Fujimaru as his high school teacher…

“He walked into my life, step by step.
Assistant Manager Choi, Choi Jinhwan.
My first love whom I’m sick and tired of.”

Kim Minjun is a 30-year-old ordinary office worker.
Unlike the wishes of someone who is twenty, all Minjun wishes for is a month-long break. 

Choi Jinhwan, Minjun’s ideal type and first love, joined his company’s design team. 

‘So annoying…
seeing him speaking informally and having no social cues, the same annoying and selfish him. 
And the fact that he is still perfectly my type is even more annoying.’

I, Kim Minjun, am still my insignificant self.
description.fr:
Kim Min-joon, un employé de bureau de 30 ans. Contrairement aux jeunes hommes d'une vingtaine d'années qui souhaitent devenir quelqu'un d'important, il n'a qu'un seul souhait, celui de pouvoir faire une bonne pause pendant un mois seulement.

Devant les yeux de Min-joon, qui avait passé ses journées ennuyeuses, son premier amour, le type idéal parfait, Choi Jin-hwan va rejoindre comme nouveau membre de l'équipe de conception.

"Je suis bouleversé. Je ne sais pas quoi dire sans réfléchir, ce qui est encore arbitraire. Au milieu de tout ça, c'est si parfait.

title.en: Seijo no Maryoku wa Bannou desu: Mou Hitori no Seijo

altTitles.ja: 聖女の魔力は万能です ～もう一人の聖女～

altTitles.en: The Saint's Magic Power Is Omnipotent: The Other Saint
The Power of the Saint is All Around: The Other Saint

description.en: Aira Misono is a run-of-the-mill high school girl, and never imagined that she’d be summoned to another world, let alone declared its savior. Yet from the moment the handsome Prince Kyle lays eyes on her, he’s convinced that she’s the long-awaited Holy Saint destined to banish darkness from his world. Aira herself maintains significant doubts. Is she really up to this challenge? She might be able to use magic, but is she really a Saint? Aira’s fears and struggles only deepen when the woman summoned alongside her begins to look more and more like the one who truly deserves that title.

Příběh je o králičí přeměňovačce, která se však vůbec nemůže přeměnit. Po nějaký době se její rodina rozhodla, že je kničemu a zostudí jejich rodinu. Proto jí dají do košíku a dvoum sluhům nařídí, aby jí odnesli na území šelem.

description.en:
I was a rabbit shapeshifter who couldn't even transform into a human by my coming of age ceremony. My family said that I was just a halfling and placed me in a basket…

"You're crying? Go on, cry more."

Then I was then picked up by a black panther with an awful personality.

"You're lacking in fighting spirit. I'll eat you the day after tomorrow, so keep trying."

This fierce beast. Staring at my trembling face, the black panther's eyes glistened.

"How thrilling."

Mom, I think he's crazy! To survive a fairly crazy black panther.

"The wild beasts are possessive, no matter what it is."

…Is it possible?

---
Vivi is a... wererabbit?! As a creature that’s supposed to transform into a human, Vivi is a failure, demonized as cursed and sent off to her doom. Luckily, her demise is cut short as Ahin of the Black Leopard Clan saves her. But with every threat and command this temperamental heir tosses at Vivi, she’s questioning her safety (and sanity). Surrounded by carnivores and their strong pheromones, she'll try to survive the chaos while stuck in her rabbit form. Will she figure out how to transform and tap into the power within her cute, furry self?
description.hu:
Nyúl alakváltó voltam, aki még emberré sem tudott átalakulni a nagykorúság ceremóniáján. A családom azt mondta, hogy csak fél éves vagyok, és egy kosárba helyeztek..."Sírsz? Gyerünk, sírj többet!" Aztán fel vett egy fekete párduc, akinek személyisége nem a legjobb. "Hiányzik belőled a harci szellem. Holnapután megeszlek, szóval jobb lesz, ha tovább próbálkozol. " A vad állat szemei csillogtak miközben remegő arcomat bámulta. "Milyen izgalmas." Anya, szerintem ő őrült! Túlélni egy őrült fekete párducot..."A vadállatok birtoklóak, bármi is legyen az." ....Ez lehetséges?

description.id:
Aku adalah pengubah bentuk kelinci yang bahkan tidak bisa berubah menjadi manusia dengan upacara kedewasaanku. Keluarga saya mengatakan bahwa saya hanya setengah dan menempatkan saya di keranjang… “Kamu menangis? Ayo, lebih banyak menangis. ” Saya kemudian dijemput oleh macan kumbang hitam dengan kepribadian yang kejam. “Kamu kurang stamina. Aku akan memakanmu lusa, jadi teruslah berusaha.” Binatang buas ini. Menatap wajahku yang gemetar, mata macan kumbang hitam itu berkilauan. “Sepertinya aku hanya merasa senang.” Bu, saya pikir dia gila! Untuk bertahan hidup dari macan kumbang hitam yang cukup gila. "Binatang buas itu posesif, tidak peduli apa itu." ….Apa itu mungkin?

description.tr:
Benim adım Vivi Lapian. Ünlü Lapian ailesinin parçasıyım ve şekil değiştirebilen bir tavşanım. Şekil değiştirenler dünyasında herkes yetişkin olunca bir insana dönüşebilir. ama bir sebepten dolayı 18 yaşıma gelmeme rağmen bir türlü dönüşemedim. Varlığımın verdiği utanç yüzünden ailem beni kara panter bölgesine terk etti. Ve ben sanki kaderimde yazılmış gibi bana bir çift parlayan kızıl gözlerle bakan kara bir leopar ile karşılaştım~ “Yem olmaktan korkuyor musun? O zaman daha çok ağla.” “Bacakların kısa olduğu için şişko tavşan.” “Seni aldım. Bu yüzden artık bana aitsin.” Bu… bu normal değil~!!! Kara panterler yetmezmiş gibi bir de aslanlar ve kurtlar ortaya çıkmaya başladı. Onca yer varken yırtıcı yaratıkların toplanma yeri olmak zorunda mıydı? Benim gibi yavru bir tavşan hayatta kalabilecek mi?

description.zh:
菲菲·雷碧安是名门望族雷碧安家族的兔子兽人。在这个只要长大就能变换成人形的世界中，她到了十八岁都无法人形化。也许是因为以她为耻，她的父母将她扔到了黑豹的领地。但她却命运般地遇到了用红瞳望着她的黑豹。可是这黑豹他……他好像是个变态!!! 除了黑豹，还有狮子和狼群，偏偏是在这个只有猛兽居住的区域里，仍旧是个小兔子的菲菲，能生存下去吗？

---

altTitles.ja: シメジシミュレーション

description.en:
A surreal yet heartwarming 4-koma series about everyday life.  
  
From the author of Shoujo Shuumatsu Ryokou/Girls' Last Tour.
description.fr: Une jeune fille s'est enfermée dans son placard pendant ses 2 dernières années de collège et se rend compte qu'elle doit maintenant passer au lycée. Quand elle sort de son placard pour la première fois en deux ans et se regarde dans le miroir, elle s'aperçoit que des champignons « shimeji » ont commencé à pousser sur sa tête.

title.en: Mou Ichido Aetara Kimi to... (Kakure) Shuuchaku-kei Danshi no Amai Dokusen Yoku

altTitles.ja: もう一度会えたらキミと… （隠れ）執着系男子の甘い独占欲

altTitles.ja-ro: Mouichido Aetara Kimi to... (Kakure) Shuuchakukei Danshi no Amai Dokusenyoku

description.ja:
「あの時からずっと触れたかった」
再会したばかりなのに、繊細に触れる長い指先も、
囁かれる甘い言葉もどうして私に優しいの…？
私は、あんなにひどいことをしたのにーー…。

母親がケガをしたと聞いて急いで病院に向かう玲。
主治医はなんと学生時代の後輩・北村椰々だった。
さらに驚くことに実家のお弁当屋が休業の間、
忙しく働いている椰々の家で家政婦をすることに!?

男性が少し苦手な玲が、唯一心を許せる相手だとは思っていたけれど、
なぜか気づけばベッドを横で椰々が寝ていて!?!?

【片想いこじらせ医者】×【異性が苦手女子】
本の隙間に挟んだまま、忘れてしまった花びらを見つけたように、
今もう一度始まる、忘れられない青春時代の恋。

altTitles.ja: 婚活ぼっち

altTitles.en: Searching for a Marriage Partner Alone

altTitles.ja: 社会的なヤンキー
世界の果ては深愛

description.en: Fuyuka is a female college student attending an art college in Tokyo, despite her parents' opposition. She feels guilty about leaving her younger brother, who has been supporting her in their strict family home, and running away from home by herself. One day, she is at her wit's end because she can't pay the rent, when her grown-up younger brother, Ameon, appears in front of her...! She is now living together with her brother, whose love is too heavy for her to bear!

title.en: Senpai ga Uzai Kouhai no Hanashi

altTitles.en: A Story About a Senior Who Annoys His Junior
A Story About a Senpai Who Annoys His Kouhai

altTitles.ja-ro: Senpai ga Urusai Kouhai no Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 先輩がうざい後輩の話

description.en:
Futaba Igarashi is a diminutive office lady who finds that her towering and boisterous work senpai Harumi Takeda always gets in her hair, but he always has her back, he always keeps her company, and she starts noticing that her heart is slowly veering towards him…  
  
1st place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga (2018)

description.ja:
ちょっぴりガサツだけど面倒見のいい先輩・武田と、そんな彼に素直になれない（？）後輩・五十嵐。

今日も五十嵐は武田をうざいと思いつつ、本当はまんざらでもなかったりやっぱり本当にうざいときもあったりと自覚のない二人の微妙な距離感にもだえちゃうことまちがいなし！
description.uk: Іґараші - працьовита молода офісна жінка. Такеда - семпай з роботи, нервує її постійно - і все ж вона стає все ближче до нього. Кожен день наповнений комічними невдачами та романтичними моментами, коли Іґараші намагається збалансувати роботу, життя та кохання.
description.pt-br: Igarashi é uma jovem esforçada que trabalha em um escritório. Takeda, o senpai acima dela no trabalho, a irrita constantemente - e ainda assim ela se encontra cada vez mais próxima dele. Todos os dias são repletos de contratempos cômicos e momentos românticos enquanto Igarashi tenta equilibrar trabalho, vida e amor.

altTitles.ja: G-戦場のマリア

description.en: Three students from an all-girls school are selling Bibles on the street... But, don't mistake them as servants of God. In actuality, they're making money for dating expenses. Even though their ways are not so good, their hearts are pure! Santa Maria, please listen to these girl's prayers!

title.en: Rules for Peddling in Another World

description.en: If you accidentally crossed over into another world, what kinds of abilities would you need to reach your peak in life? Would you became an Enchanter? A Hero? Or maybe a Cultivator of Immortal Techniques? Of course not. You would take advantage of your present day knowledge in this other world to do business and earn big bucks!

altTitles.ja: 宝石の国

description.az: Cəvahiratlar ölkəsi (Houseki no Kuni), meteoritlərin altı dəfə Yerə düşdüyü və bu prosesdə onu məhv etdiyi uzaq gələcəkdə baş verir. Demək olar ki, bütün canlılar məhv oldu, qalan bütün torpaqlar tək bir sahilə çevrildi. Çox uzun zaman dilimləri ərzində həsas həyat forması olan yeni bir irq yarandı; insan şəklini alan ölməz zinət əşyaları. Fosfofillit (Phos) zəifdir (ən aşağı sərtliklərdən birinə malikdir) və həmyaşıdları tərəfindən yararsız hesab edilir. Phos'a təbiət tarixinin ensiklopediyasını yaratmaq tapşırığı verildikdən sonra o, uzaq, lakin müdrik həmkarı Kinovarın (Cinnabar) köməyinə müraciət edir, beləliklə onların dostluğu və şəxsi inkişafı başlayır. Eyni zamanda “Cəvahirat camaatı” onun dəbdəbəli dəyərindən yararlanmaq istəyən Aydan gələnlərlə (aylılarla) müharibə aparır.
description.en: In the distant future, a new life form called Houseki (gems) are born. The 28 Houseki must fight against the moon dwellers who want to attack them and turn them into decorations, thus each gem is assigned a role such as a fighter or a medic. Though they hope to fight the moon dwellers, Phos is a gem who is given no assignment until the gems' master Adamantine asks them to write an encyclopedia.

altTitles.ja: 姉のともだち

altTitles.en: The Cutest Girl Closest to Me.

description.en:
Hinako, a friend of Asahi's older sister, is a frequent guest at the home of the high school boy. She always misleads his mind with her suggestive attitude while treating him like a little brother...or rather, pet? A love story between a gal who has a bugged sense of proximity and an otaku guy who acts like her parent! 

---
Chapters 1 & 2 can be found in [Pre-Seralization](https://mangadex.org/title/abad18cf-bf72-4bbc-97c8-b55dfa28f9b9/ane-no-yuujin).
description.ja: 姉とふたり暮らしの家にいりびたる、姉の友人・ひーちゃん。完璧に顔がよくてかわいい彼女に、オタク男子高校生・旭は翻弄されっぱなし…?

title.en: How the Little Brother Who Turned Into a Girl Became His Big Brother's Girlfriend

altTitles.ja: 兄貴の彼女になる、女の子になっちゃった弟。

altTitles.ja-ro: Aniki No Kanojo Ni Naru, Onnanoko Ni Nacchatta Otouto

altTitles.en: When I Returned Home for the First Time in a Long Time, My Brother Transformed Into a Girl

altTitles.ja: 久しぶりに実家に帰ったら弟がTSしてた。

altTitles.ja-ro: Hisashiburi Ni Jikka Ni Kaettara Otouto Ga TS Shiteta

description.en:
When I returned home for the first time in a long time, my little brother transformed into a girl!?

---

[Fantia 18+ Content](https://mangadex.org/title/7a23de9c-01b8-43bd-ac38-0bfe0bebcc3b)
description.id: Ketika aku pulang ke rumah setelah sekian lamanya adik tiri laki-laki ku berubah menjadi gadis!?

altTitles.ja: サタノファニ

description.en: A mysterious syndrome turns schoolgirls into homicidal monsters behind numerous atrocities in Japan. However, nothing is what it seems and when Chika Amagi is arrested for the brutal murder of five people, a journey into uncharted, troubled waters begins!
description.es: Un misterioso síndrome convierte a las colegialas en monstruos homicidas detrás de numerosas atrocidades en Japón. Sin embargo, nada es lo que parece y cuando Chika Amagi es arrestado por el brutal asesinato de cinco personas, ¡comienza un viaje a aguas desconocidas y turbulentas!
description.fr:
Au Japon, un mystérieux syndrome transforme les écolières d'un établissement en monstres sanguinaires, capables de tuer leurs semblables avec un sang-froid incroyable. Dans cette période de trouble, Chika Amagi, étudiante sans histoire, est arrêtée pour le meurtre terrible de cinq personnes…   


---
description.pt-br: Uma síndrome misteriosa torna jovens garotas em monstros homicidas por trás de diversas atrocidades no Japão. Entretanto, nada é o que parece quando Chika Amagai é presa pelo assassinato brutal de cinco pessoas e é levada a uma prisão em uma ilha para estas assassinas!

description.en:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

altTitles.ja: テノゲカ

description.en: Hands. It is one of the most complex organs in the human body, with a particularly complex function and structure. Therefore, there is a doctor who specializes in this organ: <Hand Surgeon>. Isshin Tezuka is a hand surgeon at Ohrando Hospital. He has an aloof appearance and is full of mystery, but the only thing that is certain about him is that he is an extremely talented hand surgeon. This is a life story woven by his hands and the many hands he heals. An authentic medical drama for the new era!
description.ja:
その日、病院に運び込まれた男性は、事故で右腕が切断されていた。絶望する男性の息子に救急スタッフが告げる。「再接着手術を行います――」「くっつくんですか…父の右腕が!?」不可能を可能にするのは【手専門の医者】。

【手外科医】手塚一心。

description.en:
The best way for the diverse human beings who make up society to unite is to find themselves a common enemy. School is a mini-version of society, so why shouldn't the same thing happen in a classroom setting?  
  
This particular class has chosen Xiao Shang to be that common enemy. But one of its more popular students soon finds himself becoming intrigued by Shang's unapologetic, straightforward way of life.  

This comic is posted for free on the author's weibo: <https://weibo.com/u/3567976483>
description.pl: Najłatwiejszym sposobem zjednoczenia się różnorodnych jednostek, które tworzą społeczeństwo, jest znalezienie wspólnego wroga. Szkoła jest mini społeczeństwem, więc czy to samo nie powinno odbywać się w klasie? Ta konkretna klasa wybrała na wspólnego wroga Xu Shanga. Ale wkrótce jeden z najpopularniejszych uczniów w szkole staje się zaintrygowany specyficznym życiem Shanga.
description.pt-br: Ao e Xun são amigos desde a infância que mantêm um relacionamento secreto fora da escola, na mesma escola existe o aluno transferido Xiao Shang que esconde uma vida totalmente diferente através de sua natureza tranquila. Círculos Sociais significam aceitações e esses meninos buscam uma forma de como se encaixar nesse meio.

description.en: Ten years ago, an earth-shattering war nearly destroyed the world. The survivors built a new world, yet it doesn't seem to have calmed down at all…
description.fr: Il y a dix ans, une guerre bouleversante a failli détruire le monde. Les survivants ont construit un nouveau monde, mais il ne semble pas du tout s'être calmé …

altTitles.ja: 葬送のフリーレン

altTitles.th: คำอธิษฐานในวันที่จากลา Frieren

altTitles.el: Φρίρεν: Πέρα από το Τέλος του Ταξιδιού

altTitles.de: Frieren: Nach dem Ende der Reise

altTitles.es-la: Frieren: Más allá del fin del viaje

description.el: Έχοντας νικήσει τον βασιλιά των δαιμόνων, το ταξίδι μιας δεκαετίας φτάνει στο τέλος του και μια νέα εποχή ειρήνης ξεκινά. Η ζωή όμως συνεχίζεται, ειδικά για την Φρίρεν, πως ως ξωτικό έχει ακόμα αιώνες ζωής μπροστά της. Με τις δεκαετίες να περνάνε, η Φρίρεν έρχεται αντιμέτωπη με την μεταβλητότητα του κόσμου και την παροδικότητα των ανθρώπων. Μετά από μια τελευταία συνάντηση με όλη την παλιά της ομάδα, συνειδητοποιεί ότι ο χρόνος που πέρασε με τους φίλους της ήταν υπερβολικά σύντομος και ότι δεν θα έχει ποτέ την ευκαιρία να τους μάθει καλύτερα. Έρχοντας αντιμέτωπη με την αλήθεια αυτή, η Φρίρεν αποφασίζει να ξεκινήσει ένα ακόμα ταξίδι αλλά αυτή τη φορά έχοντας σκοπό να μάθει το τι σημαίνει να είσαι άνθρωπος.
description.en: The adventure is over but life goes on for an elf mage just beginning to learn what living is all about. Elf mage Frieren and her courageous fellow adventurers have defeated the Demon King and brought peace to the land. With the great struggle over, they all go their separate ways to live a quiet life. But as an elf, Frieren, nearly immortal, will long outlive the rest of her former party. How will she come to terms with the mortality of her friends? How can she find fulfillment in her own life, and can she learn to understand what life means to the humans around her? Frieren begins a new journey to find the answer.
description.es: Frieren es una elfa, y como para todos los de su raza, los años pasan en un suspiro… pero no es así para sus antiguos compañeros de batalla, a los que Frieren verá morir y envejecer. De repente Frieren se da cuenta de que pese a que la vida avanza a un ritmo más lento para ella, las experiencias con sus seres queridos se le escapan de las manos. Un aire nostálgico envuelve a este manga fantástico tan entrañable que ha vendido ya más de 2,5 millones de copias en Japón.
description.fr:
Que deviennent les héros une fois le mal vaincu ?
Dans ce coffret collector : un jeu de 54 cartes entièrement personnalisé aux couleurs de la série et le manga avec une jaquette alternative réversible !

Alors que Frieren et ses compagnons font halte dans la citadelle de Heiß, Stark propose à Fern d'aller en rendez-vous, sur le ton de la plaisanterie... et contre toute attente, la jeune fille accepte ! Sur les conseils de l'elfe, qui n'y connaît pas grand-chose, le guerrier emmène donc son amie faire le tour de la ville, ce qui leur permet de se rapprocher un peu.

Après cette pause bienvenue, les trois aventuriers repartent sur les routes et arrivent au haut-plateau du Nord, une zone extrêmement dangereuse où pullulent aussi bien des monstres coriaces que des démons retors... Parviendront-ils à survivre dans cette région hostile ?
description.es-la: Tras cumplir su misión de derrotar al Rey Demonio, la maga elfo Frieren, el héroe Himmel, el sacerdote Heiter y el guerrero Eisen regresan a casa después de un viaje de una década donde disolverán su grupo y tomarán sus propios caminos. Pero el tiempo pasa de forma distinta para los elfos, Frieren comienza a ser testigo de como sus excompañeros sufren sus estragos y comienzan a morir lentamente y uno a uno. Antes de fallecer, Heiter el sacerdote, le impone a Frieren un aprendiz humana llamada Fern. Llevados por la afición que tiene la alfa por recolectar hechizos mágicos, ambos emprenderán una aventura, llena de magia e introspección, que los llevará a revisitar lugares que había conocido en su anterior travesía, mientras enfrenta el pesar que le causa descubrir todas las posibilidades que ha desperdiciado en su viaje que le hubiesen posibilitado entablar una relación más cercana con sus compañeros ahora fallecidos.
description.zh-hk: 在打倒了魔王的勇者一行人当中，魔法使芙莉莲是精灵，她和其他三人有不一样的地方。 生活在“之后”的世界里，她感受到了什么—— 留下来的人们所编织的葬送与祈祷又意味着什么—— 故事从“冒险的结束”开始。 这是讲述英雄们的活法的，后日谈奇幻作品！

description.en:
Why torment scumbags for just a moment when you can do so forever? Join Su LuXia as she transmigrates into countless worlds with her ‘Supporting Female Character’s Counterattack System’ to unleash vengeance upon the deplorable male and female leads using a variety of tactics! 

Su LuXia: "The only thing that brings me comfort is the tears of remorse from scumbag men and the agonizing groans of despicable women who can't get what they want." 

System: "Has My Esteemed Host learnt to reel back her vengeful spirit? Nope, I guess not."
description.fr:
Su Lüxia fait partie d'un "Système de rôle féminin".
Sa mission : en se téléportant dans les corps des femmes trompées et bafouées, elle renverse leur destinée.
"Seules les larmes d'un bâtard de tricheur et les gémissements de douleur d'une garce m'apportent le réconfort."
description.it:
Schiacciare un verme per un solo momento dà una soddisfazione momentanea, ma le vite passate a schiacciare i vermi forniscono vite di soddisfazione continua. Su Lüxia, la nostra protagonista femminile, trasmigra in altri mondi con il sistema di contrattacco della seconda protagonista femminile; usa schemi e trucchi elaborati per picchiare innumerevoli bastardi traditori e puttane.

Su Lüxia: "Solo le lacrime di rimorso di un bastardo traditore, e i gemiti di dolore di una puttana incapace di ottenere ciò che vuole, mi danno conforto."

Sistema: "Il mio ospite ha attinto alla sua umanità oggi? No."

title.en: Fate/Grand Order -Epic of Remnant- Pseudo-Singularity III: The Stage of Carnage, Shimousa - Seven Duels of Swordmasters

description.ru: Манга-адаптация одноименного сюжетного акта игры Fate/Grand Order. Фуджимару теряет сознание и, придя в себя, понимает, что очутилась в Японии периода Эдо. Там она встречает Миямото Мусаши, которую когда-то уже видела во сне. Исторически Мусаши был мужчиной, который прославился на весь мир как мастер меча. Почему же теперь их двое, мужчина и женщина с одним именем? Настало время начала Семи Поединков Мастеров Меча!

description.en:
Feelings may come and go, but true love always remains in the heart. Tsumiki Miniwa is in love with her best friend, Io Otonashi. For her, confessing is nearly impossible; but to her friends, they seem to be the perfect match. Cute and petite, Tsumiki comes off more as a friend, and Io's attitude toward her is friendlier than toward others. Despite the constant teasing and obvious hints that his friends have been dropping, Io always seems to miss the signs.  
  
Throughout her everyday school life, Tsumiki spends time with her friends and Io. Will she finally muster enough courage to confess her true feelings?

description.de:
In dem mysteriösen, einem RPG Dungeon ähnelnden Turm lebt der alle berühmten Hunter beneidende Gong-Ja Kim sein alltägliches Leben.
Eines Tages wird sein Wunsch nach mehr mit einem legendären Skill beantwortet, mit dem er die Fähigkeiten anderer kopieren kann ... auf Kosten seines eigenen Lebens.
Bevor er einen Sinn daraus ziehen kann, wird er vom Rang 1 Hunter, dem Flame Emperor, ermordet!
Das aktiviert aber seinen Skill und nun besitzt er einen neuen, nämlich die Möglichkeit, durch seinen Tod in der Zeit zurückzureisen.
Wie wird Gong-Ja dieses Skills nutzen, um seine Konkurrenz zu überflügeln und die Spitze zu erreichen?
description.en:
In the mysterious, RPG dungeon-like Tower, Gongja Kim lives a mundane existence, envying all the star hunters. One day, his wish for more is granted with a legendary skill to copy others’ abilities… at the cost of his life. Before he can make sense of it, he’s killed by the #1 hunter, the Flame Emperor! But this activates his skill and now he’s copied a new one, the ability to travel back in time upon death.

How will Gongja use these skills to outplay the competition and rise to the top?
description.id:
Sebuah menara tiba-tiba muncul di dunia. Dari sisi mana pun di bumi, menara tersebut tetap terlihat menembus horizon. Berbagai monster memenuhi tiap lantai yang ada di menara itu. Orang yang masuk dalam menara itu ternyata bisa mendapatkan skill! Semua orang akhirnya berbondong-bondong untuk memburu para monster dan menjadi hunter kelas dunia.

"Tapi aku hanya hunter kelas F yang tidak punya skill apa-apa, aku juga mau skill kelas S! Tunggu..."

CRING!

"Itu... Kartu emas? Akhirnya kemunculan skill-ku datang juga?"

[Skill Level S+]
[BISA MENDUPLIKASI SKILL ORANG YANG MEMBUNUHMU, HANYA TERAKTIVASI KETIKA KAMU MATI]

"Skill ini... Apa gunanya skill semacam ini?!"

description.en: Kazuma Sato is a video game-loving shut-in-or at least he was, until a humiliating traffic accident brings his young life to an untimely end. But after his death, a beautiful girl claiming to be a goddess invites him to enter another world and gain some respectable perks in the process. But Kazuma’s choice is going to have serious consequences for the goddess and the dead man alike…
description.es:
Kazuma Sato es un hikikomori que disfruta como un bellaco con los videojuegos, el manga y el anime. Un día decide salir de su casa, sufre un desafortunado accidente y fallece. Cuál es su sorpresa al ver que aparece en un limbo junto a una diosa llamada Aqua que le ofrece enviarlo a un nuevo mundo con tintes roleros y -además- concederle un deseo. Pero antes, Aqua se ocupa de humillarlo porque la muerte que él pensaba que había sido heroica salvando a una chica de ser atropellada, resulta ser lo más patética y cutre que te puedas echar a la cara. Lo único que se le ocurre al bueno de Kazuma es usar su deseo para que Aqua lo acompañe al nuevo mundo y se una a él en sus peripecias para derrotar al Rey Demonio.

En su nueva aventura encontrará una gran variedad de personajes a cada cual más cazurro, formando equipo con la pesada de Aqua, con Megumin, una maga loca por las explosiones y con Darkness, una paladín aficionada al sadomasoquismo. Viendo que su equipo está mal de la cabeza y que todas son más tontas que un zapato, Kazuma decide disfrutar de su nueva vida a lo grande, pero al final se las tendrá que ver con los generales del Rey Demonio que se cruzarán en su camino… y con sapos, un montón de babosos batracios.
description.ru: Кадзума Сато - хиккикомори, закоренелый фанат игр, аниме и манги. В какой-то момент, в попытке спасти человека он попадает в дорожную катастрофу и его жизнь обрывается. Казалось бы жизнь закончилась? Но Кадзума просыпается и видит перед собой красавицу, которая называет себя богиней. Она спрашивает, хочет ли он отправиться в другой мир? С условием, что он может взять с собой только одну вещь. Кадзума сразу же желает взять с собой богиню. Так и начинается его невероятное приключение против короля демонов, но перед этим нужно заняться другими делами. Например, найти пищу, одежду и убежище. Кадзума хочет жить в мире и спокойствия, но богиня находит одну проблему за другой. А кроме того, армия демонов имеет какие-то свои виды на него.
description.pt-br: A vida de Satou Kazuma, um hikikomori que gosta de jogos, muito em breve chegou ao fim por causa de um acidente de trânsito... Deveria ser, mas quando ele acorda, uma linda deusa aparece diante de seus olhos. "Ei, eu tenho algo um pouco agradável para você. Quer ir para outro mundo? Você pode desejar apenas uma coisa de sua escolha junto com você." "Então eu irei levá-la." Daqui em diante, a grande aventura de subjugar o Rei Demônio começará para Kazuma reencarnado, ou assim se poderia pensar, mas é o trabalho para a obter alimentos, roupas e abrigo começa! Apesar de Kazuma querer viver em paz, a deusa acaba causando problemas, um após outro, e eventualmente, eles atraem a atenção do exército do Rei Demônio.

description.az: Bu twitter qısa hekayəsi məktəbdən kənarda oğlan kimi səhv saldığı orta məktəbli qızla onun sinif yoldaşı arasındakı sevgi hekayəsini təsvir edir. Nəhayət,qızlar rok musiqisindəki ortaq zövqləri üzərində birləşirlər.
description.en:
Fashionable and upbeat high schooler Aya falls head over heels for an employee at a local CD shop. He’s got an air of mystery about him, always dressed well, and has impeccable taste in music. Little does she know — this supposedly male employee is actually her female classmate Mitsuki!

Mitsuki generally keeps to herself, but since her seat is right next to Aya’s, she can't help but be extremely aware of the other’s crush. Revealing the truth is out of the question — but perhaps getting closer to Aya wouldn’t be so bad...

***Overwhelming winner in the Web category of the 2023 Tsugimanga Awards (by Kadokawa).***
description.fr:
Une histoire très appréciée sur Twitter sur fond de musique de Rock.

Aya, une populaire lycéenne tombe sous le charme du discret vendeur du magasin de musique qu'elle fréquente.

Retour en classe, elle raconte toute l'histoire à ses amies et comment elle a un faible pour ce garçon aux airs de prince charmant.

Ce qu'elle ne sait pas c'est que ce mystérieux vendeur n'est en fait que sa voisine de bureau , Mitsuki, qu'elle a confondu pour un jeune homme.

Comment leur relation va-t-elle évolué ? Arriveront elles à expliquer ce quiproquo ?
description.id:
Series Pendek Twitter yang menggambarkan cerita tentang Gyaru dan Teman Sekelasnya.
Gyaru yang suka musik rock dan sering mendatangi toko kaset jatuh cinta ke pekerja paruh waktu yang bekerja disitu, tapi sedikit dia tahu ternyata pekerjanya itu perempuan dan teman sekelasnya.

description.uk: Популярна серія коротких манґ у твіттері, в якій розповідається про історію кохання між ґяру та її однокласницею, яку вона помилково сприймає як хлопця поза школою, через їхню взаємну любов до рок-музики.
description.pt-br:
Uma Gyaru/Gal que não se parece tanto com suas amigas (Gyarus também) frequenta uma loja de CD's e se apaixona pelo funcionário(?) de meio período do local.
Mas mal sabe ela que o funcionário(?) na realidade é uma menina e é uma das suas colegas de classe.

High schooler Irie Saki has been bullied and left all alone after a certain incident at school. description.en: Since his childhood, Kiomaru has been formed by master Sadamitsu of the Gassan forge so that he could later become a specialist in sword making. One day, when he learns of the brutal death of a young man to which he sold his first sword, he realize his own inexperience and decides to adopt a new attitude by following an exacting training. After avenging the young man, he continues his training, but one day, his master reveal to him an unbelievable secret: 18 years ago, meteorites nicknamed "Steel of the stars" fell from the sky on a dark mountain. Since that day, it seems the wheel of destiny enforced itself.

description.en: Miyako Kirishima, a university student and aspiring teacher, is a poor girl who enjoys being frugal. One day, she has a meal with Yui Nakano, her friend whom she occasionally tutors. On the way home, Yui invites her to a love hotel. Miyako is reluctant, unwilling to have sex with a friend. However, Yui cuts her off, offering her 30000 yen for sex! Subsequently, Miyako ends up in more "transactions" with her other friends at her women's university!? The curtain rises on a tale of yuri, friendship, money, and sex♡.
description.id: Kirishima Miyako, mahasiswa di sebuah universitas khusus wanita dan calon guru, adalah seorang gadis miskin yang menjalani hidup serba hemat. Suatu hari, setelah ditraktir oleh teman gadisnya Nakano Yui, dia diajak untuk mengunjungi ke love hotel. Namun, dia menolaknya karena enggan untuk berhubungan seks dengan temannya. Sampai kemudian, Yui menawarkannya 30.000 yen jika Miyako menerima ajakannya. Sejak saat itu, Miyako melakukan lebih banyak "transaksi" dengan teman-temannya yang lain dari universitasnya!? description.en: The elven girl Aria is a stunning and swift adventurer. When a small cat-like beast with an adorable face embraces Aria's fruitful chest during a dungeon exploration, she decides to keep it as a pet and names it "Tama". At first sight it's just an average cat, but Aria has yet to notice that Tama is a reincarnated chivalrous former Knight and that its identity is not that of a cat, but of a young monster of the strongest class "Behemoth".
description.es:
La chica elfa, "Aria" es una aventurera. Cuando una pequeña bestia con una cara adorable abraza el fructífero pecho de Aria, ella decide tenerla como mascota y la llama "Tama". A primera vista es sólo un gato común, pero Aria aún no se ha dado cuenta de que Tama es un antiguo Caballero y que su identidad no es un gato, sino un joven monstruo de la clase más fuerte "Behemoth".  
  
**Links:**

Ao primeiro sinal é apenas um gato comum, mas Aria ainda não notou que esta Tama é um cavaleiro antigo e sua identidade não é de um gato, mas um jovem monstro da classe mais poderosa chamada "Behemoth".

altTitles.en: The Big Villain Brother and the Junior Sisters Are All Sick and Delicate
The Great Villain Senior Brother and All of His Yandere Junior Sisters

description.en:
Lin Xiao became Villain senior Brother of the Qinglan Sect after Reincarnation!

As long as you follow the plot of the original book, and become a Evil villain, you can become a God and ascend to heaven!

Even if he is suffering he had no choice but to tease the fourth junior sister, steal the clothes of the third junior sister, pour some strong medicine into the second junior sister’s water, and conscientiously perform the villain’s duties.
And Finally made it to the day when the male protagonist became a teacher!

Lin Xiao was very excited and prepared to poison the male lead. According to the plot, he will be caught by several junior sisters and thrown by the male lead.

He did not expect......
- - -
Second Junior Sister: My Eldest Senior Brother is still so kind, how can this bit of poison be enough! Look at me!

Third Junior Sister: I'll kill Ye Chen, and kidnap my Senior Brother! He is mine alone!

Fourth Junior Sister: I'll kill everyone... Create a world where there is only my Senior Brother!

Beautiful Master: He's so cute, poisoning behind his back, he really deserves to be called my good disciple.

Lin Xiao: (⊙ˍ⊙) You all should read the script! It's me who should be killed!

A relaxed and joyful anti-routine fairy tale.

title.en: A Marriage Contract with Two Husbands

description.en:
Roselaine married Grand Duke Melchior, the best knight in the Empire. He said it’s because, “I want to save you.” Roselaine can only respond, “You don’t know anything about me.”

A man who wants to save her life, save her family, pay off her debts, and even marry her? They say there’s no such thing as a favor without any strings attached, so why would he go this far for someone he doesn’t even know?

“Because you look like someone I knew.” Roselaine evidently looks just like Melchior’s first love.

While depressed because she thinks she is only a stand-in for his first love, Roselaine takes in Julian, who looks exactly like her husband’s childhood self, as her disciple. But then Julien asks, “Please divorce him and marry me, Roselaine.”

What happens if she marries both men?

altTitles.vi: Làm ơn, giúp tớ cởi nó xuống!

description.en:
There is a curse on this school. It prevents the person who commits "impure acts" from taking off his or her panties. Only the right hand of the protagonist can break the curse and remove the panties, his name is Kamite.

Kamite tells the girls that they have been cursed and that he can take off their panties, but... obviously it is almost unacceptable for them to have any man take them off...!

This is how the girls end up in a lot of trouble. But if the panties are not removed, they can get into even more trouble...
description.es: Hay una maldición en esta escuela. La cual, le impide quitarse la ropa interior a toda persona que cometa "actos impuros" dentro de la escuela. Solamente la mano derecha de Kamite es capaz de romper la maldición y quitarles la ropa interior. Él les menciona a las chicas que han sido maldecidas y que es capaz de quitarles la ropa interior, pero… ¡Obviamente es casi inaceptable para ellas que un hombre cualquiera se las quite…! Así es como las chicas terminan pasando por momentos de confusión. Pero, si no les es quitada la ropa interior, puede que tengan algo que lamentar.
description.pt-br: Existe uma maldição nesta escola. Que impede que a pessoa que cometa “atos impuros” tire sua calcinha. Só a mão direita do protagonista consegue quebrar a maldição e tirar a calcinha, seu nome é Kamite. Kamite fala para as garotas que elas foram amaldiçoadas e que ele pode tirar sua calcinha, mas… obviamente é quase inaceitável para elas que um homem qualquer a tire…! É assim que as garotas acabam passando por vários perrengues. Mas se a calcinha não for retirada, elas podem ter mais problemas ainda.

description.en:
A twisted girls' love story featuring: A devilish girl hiding behind the mask of an honor student x An ordinary girl who hates losing.

Wakaba Yoshizawa has a childhood friend named Komaki Umezono.

This girl wore the mask of an honor student with good morals who's blessed with both beauty and brains, but in reality she's an evil genius who looked down on people. For the sake of regaining the dignity she lost to Komaki, Wakaba challenges her to a match, but Komaki tells her "Each time I win, I will take one precious thing from you." as a condition!? Every time she loses to the girl she "hates", her true feelings get exposed.

(Source: Young Ace Up)
description.th: อุเมะโซโนะ โคมากิ เพื่อนสมัยเด็กของ โยชิซาวะ วาคาบะ เธอสวมหน้ากากนักเรียนดีเด่นทั้งที่เป็นผู้หญิงชั่วร้าย ที่ชอบดูถูกผู้คน เพื่อกอบกู้ศักดิ์ศรีที่โคมากิแย่งชิงไปจากเธอ วาคาบะ จึงต้องแข่งขันกับเธอ โดยมีเงื่อนไขว่าถ้าชนะ เธอจะพรากสิ่งสำคัญหนึ่งอย่างของวาคาบะไป...!? "ฉันเกลียดเธอ!" ถึงจะเป็นแบบนั้น ทุกครั้งที่พ่ายแพ้ความรู้สึกที่แท้จริงก็ค่อย ๆ ถูกเปิดเผยออกมา
description.es-la:
¡Una distorsionada historia de amor entre la estudiante modelo con una máscara demoníaca y la chica común que no se rinde!

Wakaba Yoshizawa, la amiga de la infancia de Wakaba, Komaizumi Komaki. Ella era una chica malvada que llevaba una máscara de estudiante modelo perfecta y talentosa, que miraba por encima del hombro a los demás. Wakaba desafía a Komaki para recuperar su dignidad que le fue arrebatada, pero se le pone una condición: "Si gano, tomaré una cosa importante de Wakaba una por una" ¡Cada vez que pierde contra ella, revela sus verdaderos sentimientos! ¡Una emocionante historia de amor entre chicas que ganó el Premio de Oro en el 28vo Concurso Sneaker Award, ahora en formato de cómic!
description.pt-br:
Uma história de amor distorcida entre garotas: uma garota diabólica escondida por trás da máscara de uma estudante exemplar x uma garota comum que odeia perder.

Wakaba Yoshizawa tem uma amiga de infância chamada Komaki Umezono.

Essa garota usava a máscara de uma estudante exemplar com boas virtudes, abençoada com beleza e inteligência, mas na realidade ela é uma gênio do mal que despreza as pessoas. Para recuperar a dignidade perdida para Komaki, Wakaba desafia-a para um duelo, mas Komaki lhe diz: "Cada vez que eu ganhar, vou tirar algo precioso de você." como condição!? Cada vez que ela perde para a garota que "odeia", seus verdadeiros sentimentos são expostos.

altTitles.ja: バーフウラーズ

description.en: I am 30 years old, jobless and in despair, when I was invited to become a "Girls Bar Manager." So I entered the world of urban nightlife, and what awaited me was a very cute cast of girls. However, the owner had an ironclad rule for me: "Never touch any of the bar girls." I wonder if I will be able to stick to the rule...... This adult-themed romantic comedy takes place in a girls bar, a place of relaxation for gentlemen!

A world in which Korea is the global capital of combat sports. At Nam-Il High School where the best and most talented students of martial arts reside, Jiu Ji-Tae suddenly finds himself thrust into their midst despite being a total weakling.  
  
By neutralizing his physical shortcomings through jiu-jitsu, can he rise to the top of the fight classes?  


---
description.fr:
Un monde dans lequel la Corée est le Pays leader des sports de combats. Au lycée Nam-il où les meilleurs et plus talentueux élèves en arts martiaux étudient, Jiu Ji-tae se trouve soudainement entraîné avec eux alors qu'il n'est qu'un faiblard.  
  
En faisant disparaître ses défauts physiques à l'aide du Ju-Jitsu, pourra-t-il devenir le meilleur des classes de combat ?  


---

**Links:**

description.pt-br:
Em um mundo onde a Coréia do Sul é a capital mundial dos esportes de combate, o Colégio Namil é onde os melhores e mais talentosos estudantes de artes marciais competem, e nosso protagonista Jiu Jitei se encontra subitamente em meio à eles mesmo sendo um fracote completo.
  
Superando suas fraquezas com jiu-jitsu, será que Jitei consegue chegar ao topo das turmas de luta?

altTitles.ja: 嘘喰い

description.en:
There are gamblers out there who even bet their lives as ante. But to secure the integrity of these life-threatening gambles, a violent and powerful organization by the name of “Kakerou” referees these games as a neutral party. Follow Baku Madarame a.k.a. Usogui (The Lie Eater) as he gambles against maniacal opponents at games – such as Escape the Abandoned Building, Old Maid, and Hangman – to ultimately “out-gamble” and control the neutral organization of Kakerou itself.  


---

**Links:**  
- [OAV on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=14163)
description.ru:
Есть игроки, которые ставят на кон свою жизнь. Чтобы сохранить целостность таких смертельно-опасных игр, жестокая и могущественная организация «Кагэро» судит их, как нейтральная сторона.
Наш герой — Баку Мадарамэ, «Пожиратель лжи». Игрок, чья цель — переиграть и в конце взять под контроль саму нейтральную организацию «Кагэро».

---

(Source: [readmanga](https://mintmanga.live/pojiratel_lji))
description.es-la: Hay jugadores que incluso apuestan su vida como apuesta. Pero para asegurar la integridad de estas apuestas que ponen en peligro la vida, una violenta y poderosa organización llamada "Kakerou" arbitra estos juegos como parte neutral. Sigue a Baku Madarame, también conocido como Usogui (El Devorador de Mentiras), mientras se enfrenta a oponentes maníacos en juegos como "Escapar del Edificio Abandonado", "La Vieja Doncella" y "El Ahorcado", para acabar jugando más que la propia organización neutral de Kakerou

A story about an old ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

altTitles.ja: メリーさん

description.en:
Mary-san who calls you on the phone, telling you she's nearby...nothing but a prank call, right? Witness the cute and charming life she lives!

This is based on the Japanese urban legend Mary-san.  If it makes no sense at all to you, see https://www.kowabana.net/2018/06/09/mary-san/ and it will be a lot more comprehensible, while still being cute.
